_comment: Example hook patterns for Claude Code. Adapt to your workflow.
_usage: Copy relevant patterns to ~/.claude/settings.json under 'hooks' key.

console_log_detection._description: Warn when edited files contain console.log statements

tmux_reminder._description: Remind to use tmux for long-running commands

hooks.command: echo "$CLAUDE_COMMAND" | grep -qE '(npm install|cargo build|pytest|make test)' && echo '[TIP] Consider tmux for long commands'

pre_compact_log._description: Log when context compaction is triggered

session_start_context._description: Load previous session context on start

hooks.command: test -f .claude/session-notes.md && echo '[Context] Previous session notes available at .claude/session-notes.md'
